resource.chars:
difficulties in the way of 
both the received & opposing 
views of the mode in 
which such eyes subserve 
vision.
In a word, Dr Hicks Memoir 
might well find a place in 
a journal but I think it 
is not fit for the Transactions 
of the Royal Society - where 
such a subject is dealt with 
at all, should be treated 
comprehensively & exhaustively 
T H Huxley FRS
The Secretary of the Royal Society
